data.title: Utopos Games
data.meta_description: Groundbreaking U.S.-based video game developer led by top industry veterans, we build games for PC, console and mobile platforms, both premium and free-to-play. Utopos Games has the passion and expertise to bring new games to the world.
data.text:
About Us

​

Utopos Games

/yo͞oˈtōpōs/ - The Good Place, The Place of Utopia

We are Utopos Games, a video game developer based out of Las Vegas, Nevada. We’re comprised of industry veterans with an average of 20 years of professional game development experience. We’ve worked in leading roles on groundbreaking franchises like Command & Conquer, The Lord of the Rings, and more. We’ve built games for PCs, consoles and mobile, premium and free-to-play. We’ve built strategy games, arcade action games, shooters, and more. We’re a team of some of the world’s best and most experienced programmers, game designers and artists. We have the passion, the knowledge, and the experience to bring new games into the world.

​

We have all worked together in various different teams over the years, starting from Westwood Studios some 20 years ago. All of us still have a passion to create something new, push the industry, and are ready to come together. In early 2019, we did. We decided that it is time for us to found a new studio. Utopos Games was born.

​

We are already hard at work on our game Raivo. The game will be modern, accessible, cross-platform and free-to-play. We believe in driving the art of game making in ways that haven’t been pushed. We’re building something nobody’s done before and we firmly believe it can transform the world of games. We’re incredibly excited about this game, stay with us, subscribe to our newsletter, follow us on social media, and join us on this journey!

​
